duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete administrative processes of the branch to support operational efficiency, effectiveness, customer satisfaction, and profitability.
Provide superior customer service and communication to internal and external customers.
Oversight of accounts receivable process and maintain local collection contacts to support centralized function.
Complete Fleet Service activities such as licensing, permitting, in/out service vehicles, research and process citations.
Perform process analyses and reviews in areas such as billing, reports, credit memos, citations, accounts receivable, and other areas.
Maintains District Personnel Files, complete weekly payroll, and process paperwork for new hires.
Projects and tasks as assigned by Branch Financial Manager and District Financial Manager.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required, degree preferred
